page.title: 03Round Pond,Peter Pan
page.content: Lovely area to live in.Quite residential with a few hotels but mainly a royal park.Kensington Gardens with the round pond is very popular,especially for nannies with children in prams. Model boat sailing on the pond and kite flying round it are to be seen on every Sunday. Italian formal fountains flow intop the Long water which then flows under Serpenine Bridge into the Serpentine itself.Many rare water-fowl nest in the reeds in the long water. Statue of J.M.Barrie's Peter Pan brings many tourists and contributes to very relaxed,serene atmosphere. No traffic allowed in Kensington Gardens.
